DOC.brief_summary: The investigators are retrospectively comparing detection rates of adenomatous polyps, advanced adenomas, and size assessment of the polyps among Rush University Medical Center endoscopists. The investigators plan to review whether the size assessment of adenomatous polyps affected the surveillance protocols and if the location of polyps detected affected the detection rates.
DOC.brief_title: Endoscopic Size Assessment of Advanced Adenomatous Polyps
DOC.criteria: Presence of adenomatous polyps detected at endoscopy and diagnosed pathologically by tissue biopsy Have a colonoscopy at RUMC for screening purposes Failure to meet inclusion criteria Previous diagnosis of IBD or colorectal cancer
